channel.title: Brodie Robertson
channel.description:
For all general enquiries feel free to contact me through any social media service listed below, If you'd like to longer form something longer form like fan mail or you have a video suggestion, feel free to send me an email.
If you'd like to chat, then come join my Discord: https://brodierobertson.xyz/discord All of the scripts and configs that I write are available on my GitHub. Email: brodierobertsonbusiness@gmail.com

item.title: Ubuntu Linux And The GNOME Wayland Problem
item.description:
Ubuntu's flagship version is powered by GNOME but coming soon the project wants to drop X11 support, however Ubuntu isn't ready to do so, at this stage what is going to happen is completely up in the air
==========Support The Channel========== ‚ñ∫ Patreon: https://brodierobertson.xyz/patreon ‚ñ∫ Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal ‚ñ∫ Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay ‚ñ∫ Amazon USA: https://brodierobertson.xyz/amazonusa
==========Resources========== Wayland Significant Issues: https://community.kde.org/Plasma/Wayland_Known_Significant_Issues GDM Change: https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/gdm/-/merge_requests/277 Fedora Cleared To Ship: https://pagure.io/fesco/issue/3408 Dropping X11: https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/gnome-session/-/merge_requests/99
=========Video Platforms========== üé• Odysee: https://brodierobertson.xyz/odysee üé• Podcast: https://techovertea.xyz/youtube üéÆ Gaming: https://brodierobertson.xyz/gaming

item.title: SSPL Is Not An Open Source License
item.description:
The SSPL is a very interesting software license and whilst it's not official an open source license many do argue it should be treated as one and actually is one, but why is there this discrepancy.
==========Support The Channel========== ‚ñ∫ Patreon: https://brodierobertson.xyz/patreon ‚ñ∫ Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal ‚ñ∫ Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay ‚ñ∫ Amazon USA: https://brodierobertson.xyz/amazonusa
==========Resources========== SSPL License: https://www.mongodb.com/legal/licensing/server-side-public-license AGPLv3: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0.en.html MongoDB: https://www.mongodb.com/legal/licensing/server-side-public-license Mailing List: http://lists.opensource.org/pipermail/license-review_lists.opensource.org/2019-January/003933.html

item.title: AMD Pro Drivers Suck Slightly Less On Linux
item.description:
We love AMD on Linux, it's simply just easy to get this hardware working on Linux and now even with AMD Pro drivers which most don't really need are getting a little bit better.
==========Support The Channel========== ‚ñ∫ Patreon: https://brodierobertson.xyz/patreon ‚ñ∫ Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal ‚ñ∫ Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay ‚ñ∫ Amazon USA: https://brodierobertson.xyz/amazonusa
==========Resources========== AMD Pro Release Notes: https://www.amd.com/en/resources/support-articles/release-notes/RN-AMDGPU-UNIFIED-LINUX-25-10-1.html OBS Change: https://ideas.obsproject.com/posts/2591/please-enable-amf-amd-hw-encoding-options-on-linux

item.title: „ÄêNiri„ÄëWhat's The Deal With Scrollable Window Managers
item.description:
StreamElements Tip: http://brodierobertson.xyz/streamelements Check out my Twitch: http://brodierobertson.xyz/twitch
I've been meaning to try out Niri, so lets get it
